attributes.action: To require UK based Internet Service Providers to block access to www.ask.fm
attributes.additional_details:
The ask.fm website provides a forum for anonymous cyberbullying of children and adults. Currently it hosts content which is contrary to UK law, including threats of sexual and physical violence, threats to kill, racist and homophobic slurs and incitement to commit suicide.

We, the undersigned, request that the UK Government pursue all legal avenues to compel Internet Service Providers to block access to this website
